title: Functional Design
description: I create intuitive, usable designs that ensure easy navigation and clear calls-to-action, helping you achieve your business goals.

title: Content-Based Design
description: I align the design with your content, ensuring that your message is supported by the visual structure, making information easy to digest.

title: Responsiveness
description: Every site I create is mobile-friendly, using:
points: Min and max values for scalable elements
Flexbox and Grid for fluid layouts
Absolute and relative values for adaptable designs

title: UI Design
description: I focus on delivering a seamless user experience (UX) by ensuring clean navigation, quick load times, and overall usability.

title: Aesthetic Design
description: Your site will have a striking visual design with:
points: Carefully chosen color schemes and gradients
Smooth animations and transitions for engaging interactivity
Unique, custom-designed icons and images to elevate your branding

title: Custom-Made Graphics
description: I create tailored graphics, including icons, images, and illustrations, using tools like:
points: Illustrator, Photoshop, and Figma for creating high-quality custom SVGs and PNGs
AI-generated images for creative and dynamic visual elements
AI-generated resources like presentations to speed up design processes
